TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract ITemplate

summary.span: 定義子控制項填入樣板化 ASP.NET 伺服器控制項的行為。

span.span: Defines the behavior for populating a templated ASP.NET server control with child controls.

summary.span: 子控制項表示網頁上定義的內嵌樣板。

span.span: The child controls represent the inline templates defined on the page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個介面是自訂伺服器控制項所使用的但永遠不會實作它們。This interface is used by custom server controls, but never implemented by them. ASP.NET 一律會實作它。ASP.NET always implements it. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範簡單樣板化的伺服器控制項使用介面，以建立樣板化的屬性。The following code example demonstrates a simple templated server control that uses the interface to create a templated property. [!code-csharp[Classic ITemplate Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic ITemplate Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic ITemplate Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic ITemplate Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void InstantiateIn(class System.Web.UI.Control container) cil managed

param.name: container
param.span: 包含內嵌樣板之控制項執行個體的 物件。

span.span: The object to contain the instances of controls from the inline template.

summary.span: 當類別實作時，定義子控制項和樣板所屬的 物件。

span.span: When implemented by a class, defines the object that child controls and templates belong to.

summary.span: 這些子控制項依次定義在內嵌樣板內。

span.span: These child controls are in turn defined within an inline template.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在開發樣板化的伺服器控制項時，您不需要實作這個方法。.NET Framework 會提供您的實作。When developing templated server controls, you do not need to implement this method; the .NET Framework provides the implementation for you. ## Examples [!code-csharp[ITemplate_Interface#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ITemplate_Interface/CS/itemplate.cs#2)] [!code-vb[ITemplate_Interface#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ITemplate_Interface/VB/itemplate.vb#2)]
